data.actual_result: This error message appears:  You are unable to join voice channels
data.expected_result: You should be unmuted and be able to join voice channels
data.short_description: Unmuting yourself in discord web browser results in unsupported browser message
data.steps_to_repro: - Log into the web browser version of discord - Note that you are both muted and deafened - click on the unmute button
